cell-methods: Error: area: time: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) not found in cell methods, please register
description: Rate of change of snow mass through sublimation divided by grid-cell area. If a model does not differentiate between the sublimation of snow and sea ice, we recommend to report all sublimation within sisndmasssubl as long as the ice is snow covered.
ui-label: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Evaporation or Sublimation
